titles.title: Uchi no Kaisha no Chiisai Senpai no Hanashi
Story of a Small Senior in My Company
chiisaisenpai
うちの会社の小さい先輩の話
My Tiny Senpai
МОЯ НЕВЫСОКАЯ КОЛЛЕГА
A Veterana Pitica da Firma

anime.description: * Based on a romantic manga by http://anidb.net/cr62953 [Saisou]. http://anidb.net/ch131099 [Shinozaki] is an office worker who is taken care of and coddled by his senior team member http://anidb.net/ch131098 [Katase Shiori]: a gorgeous, profoundly kind, loving, and diminutive woman. Shinozaki certainly hopes that she`s not doing it out of duty... but her joy of doing so increasingly exposes her feelings! Source: M-U

externalentity.identifier: うちの会社の小さい先輩の話

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

episode.title: うちの会社の先輩は小さくて可愛い
My Senpai Is Small and Cute
Ma supérieure au boulot est petite et adorable
Uchi no Kaisha no Senpai wa Chiisakute Kawaii
episode.summary: Shinozaki Takuma is in his first year of employment at his new job, and is encountering a lot of the same struggles most new workers run into. But the presence of a cute, doting senpai named Katase Shiori might make the job worth it, no matter how tough it gets. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こう見えて意外とお姉さんでしょ?
Despite Appearances, I`m More the Big Sister Type.
On ne dirait pas, mais je ferais une bonne épouse, non ?
Kou Miete Igai to Onee-san Desho?
episode.summary: After their manager`s attempt to arrange a romantic dinner for the two of them, a rainy day leaves Shinozaki feeling under the weather, and Shiori decides to check in on him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私って, こんな風に見えてるんですか?
Is This How I Look to You?
C’est comme ça que vous me voyez ?
Watashitte, Konna Fuu ni Mieterundesuka?
episode.summary: Shinozaki and Shiori reminisce over past experiences at work during lunch with Akina. On their way back to the office they happen upon a crane game with plushies that remind them of one another. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 篠崎さんの事は, まだ...
When It Comes to Him, I`m Not Sure Yet...
À propos de Shinozaki, je ne sais pas trop…
Shinozaki-san no Koto wa, Mada...
episode.summary: Chinatsu has plans to attend a cosplay event on a day off from work and doesn`t want her coworkers to know. While on her way she happens to bump into her manager. Later on, Katase has a piece of chocolate for Halloween that contains alcohol. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 放送直前! 会社説明会
Pre-Broadcast Special
Housou Chokuzen! Kaisha Setsumei Kai
Opening
Ending
寄り道して帰りませんか?
Shall We Go Somewhere Before Heading Home?
Ça vous dirait, de faire un petit détour avant de rentrer ?
Yorimichi Shite Kaerimasenka?
episode.summary: On their way back to the office from a client meeting, Shinozaki and Shiori are approached by a reporter looking to do a story on a couple and, after some discussion, the pair decide to pretend to be a couple for her video. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本能に抗えない!
I Can`t Resist My Instincts!
Je ne peux pas résister à mes instincts !
Honnou ni Aragaenai!
episode.summary: It`s the end of the year, and as Shinozaki and Shiori are filled with anticipation for a new year, Chinatsu is staring down a deadline for her new dojinshi, with her only help coming from an unexpected individual. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 本当にいらないんですか?
You Sure You Don`t Want One?
Vous êtes sûr de ne pas en vouloir ?
Hontou ni Iranaindesuka?
episode.summary: Returning to work after New Year`s Shiori thinks she`s gotten taller and she asks Shinozaki if he notices anything different about her. Later, Yutaka swipes her brother`s phone and sends a message to Shiori asking for a picture. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 8
